cause.description:
I'm running a marathon on December 02, 2007 on behalf of the training program to benefit the San Francisco AIDS Foundation. I train four days a week for the next six months and need to raise $3000. If you can, please contribute to my fundraising goal (any amount is better than no amount).
Contribute here to my marathon fund: http://aidsmarathon.org/participant.asp?runner=SF-5133&EventCode=LV07
I'm keeping a blog to update my marathoning progress at: maryamgoesrunning.blogspot.com
in loving memory: amy woolington (october 21, 1985 - january 19, 2007)
1. Because HIV/AIDS isn't going anywhere, we need to do what we can to help those touched by the disease.
2. Because this is the least I can do
cause.mission: raise money for those living with HIV/AIDS on behalf of the SF AIDS Foundation
cause.name: National AIDS Marathon Training Program
